name: Mitigation Playbook for Unauthorized PowerShell Execution Incident
description: This playbook outlines the steps to mitigate an incident of unauthorized access and execution of PowerShell scripts.

action--a1c6f845-d95e-4f23-8cfc-a855c85b.name: Kill malicious PowerShell process
action--a1c6f845-d95e-4f23-8cfc-a855c85b.description: Terminate any running PowerShell scripts that are unauthorized.

action--d8e963fc-1f7f-49b9-bcb8-ccaf80b8.name: Perform full system scan
action--d8e963fc-1f7f-49b9-bcb8-ccaf80b8.description: Conduct a comprehensive scan of the system to identify any remaining threats.

conditional-loop--0bdcde87-3693-487e-b03.name: Scan Clean Check
conditional-loop--0bdcde87-3693-487e-b03.description: Repeat the scan until the system is confirmed clean.

action--0bdcde87-3693-487e-b03e-2f8e07db.name: Remove unauthorized scripts
action--0bdcde87-3693-487e-b03e-2f8e07db.description: Delete any unauthorized PowerShell scripts found on the system.
